ref: 10211 *murati1 ʻ crushes, rubs ʼ. 2. *mulati. [Cf. perf. subj. mumurat RV., pass. mūryátē ŚBr., múr -- m. ʻ destroyer ʼ RV. -- &rcirclemacr 1. Pk. muraï ʻ squeezes ʼ, muria -- ʻ broken, bent ʼ; Wg. muriam ʻ I thresh ʼ; H. murānā ʻ to chew ʼ; -- Pk. mūraï ʻ breaks ʼ (with ū from mūryátē?); Kho. mūrik ʻ to rub, squeeze, massage, roll up, crumple ʼ; K. mūrun ʻ to shell or husk (peas, grain, &c.), crush (parched peas &c. with teeth), rub gently (to allay itching) ʼ; -- caus. with mor -- : WPah.śeu. mornū ʻ to crush with hand and mix before eating (e.g. bread) ʼ; OMarw. moraï ʻ rubs, crushes ʼ; G. morvũ ʻ to shred (vegetables) ʼ.
